alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Harrison; Jefferson; Tuscarawas (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 12:53AM EDT until June 14 at 1:30AM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pittsburgh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Harrison County in east central Ohio... Northwestern Jefferson County in east central Ohio... Carroll County in east central Ohio... Tuscarawas County in east central Ohio... * Until 130 AM EDT. * At 1253 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Carrollton, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Trees snapped and uprooted. Power outages can be expected. * Locations impacted include... New Philadelphia, Dover, Uhrichsville, Carrollton, Dennison, Strasburg, Sugarcreek, Salineville, Gnadenhutten, Malvern, Tuscarawas, and Bolivar. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
